resources.string: Welcome to TradeHero!
Let\'s get started…
Give us a second as we load regions…
Tap on the map to see the list of stock exchanges
Tap to select at least one exchange
Tap to select up to %s exchanges
All %s exchanges selected
You cannot select more than %d markets\nUnselect some to select others
You need to select at least one exchange
What are your favorite sectors?
You cannot select more than %d sectors\nUnselect some to select others
You need to select at least one sector
Top Trade Heroes. Follow them!
You cannot select more than %d heroes\nUnselect some to select others
You need to select at least one hero
Trending Stocks. Favorite them!
You cannot select more than %d stocks\nUnselect some to select others
You need to select at least one stock
Ka-ching!
You now have a budget of
100,000 virtual dollars
Some of your favorites are trending.\nWould you like to buy shares?
Yes, buy shares!
Later, I will look around first
